abstract: The preferred alignment of the view within a scroll view’s visible region when scrolling to a view.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this API in conjunction with a `ScrollViewProxy/scrollTo(_:anchor)` or when updating the binding provided to a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/scrollPosition(id:anchor:)].

When used with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/scrollPosition(id:anchor:)] modifier, this value will be preferred over the anchor specified in the modifier for the current transaction.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the transaction originated from an action that produces a sequence of values.
items.name: isContinuous

items.description: Whether this transaction will track the velocity of any animatable properties that change.
items.name: tracksVelocity

items.description: Accesses the transaction value associated with a custom key.
items.name: subscript(_:)
